.. py:function:: urn_doc_from_text(text)

   
   Return urn doc from text.

   :param text: Description for ``text``.
   :type text: str

   :returns: *str* -- Description of return value.

   .. rubric:: Examples

   >>> from kgfoundry_common.ids import urn_doc_from_text
   >>> result = urn_doc_from_text(...)

   ...

.. py:function:: urn_chunk(doc_hash, start, end)

   
   Return urn chunk.

   :param doc_hash: Description for ``doc_hash``.
   :type doc_hash: str
   :param start: Description for ``start``.
   :type start: int
   :param end: Description for ``end``.
   :type end: int

   :returns: *str* -- Description of return value.

   .. rubric:: Examples

   >>> result  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
